geocode_en.formatted_address: 1 Gloucester Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong

result.adr_address: 1 Gloucester Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.formatted_address: 1 Gloucester Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
result.name: The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts

reviews.text: This is a great place to indulge yourself into arts ans culture. There are a lot of performances without heavy marketing, live on stage and reasonably priced tickets. I came to this place since I was in high school, and still love this place

We attend performances at the Lyric theatre at the Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts (HKAPA) in Wan Chai probably 2-3 times a year on average depending on the HK Arts Festival line up and other performances scheduled throughout the year. 

It is a decent theatre with good enough acoustics. There are three levels of seating and most seats are comfortable enough for shows. Toilet facilities are on the ground floor not far from the ticketing counter. 

The complex is within short walk of the Wanchai MTR Station and some decent dining in the Wanchai district if you know where to look for it.
Great theatre with lots of shows
NYC good place quiet

Small in seating capacity. Not top class performance facility. Students grade performance facility. Management are rigid and not well facilitate user's need there.
They run major performance even but the canteen was not coped with the need and closed. User need to walk a bit far away to get a meal before the art performance. My feeling of the management people is Not professional.

result.name: Lyric Theatre, HKAPA

reviews.text: Great place in HK where you can see different kids of performances including drama, music concerto and more.
Wonderful theatre with great acoustics and the production of warhorse was spectacular... Would definitely recommend it
A nice intimate setting for plays and other types of performance art. The facilities are good and well maintained.
Watched War Horse here. The lights, sound and seats all help with a wonderful immersive experience.
Good show good theatre.

result.name: 香港演藝學院歌劇院

reviews.text: 燈光，音響，都有很好的設備。工作人很友善，今天去睇舞台劇，但脚受傷了，工作人員除了指示我跟朋友如何乘搭電梯外，更親自為我們按著電梯，讓我有足夠時間進入，很感謝他們。
空調十足座位寬敞職員有禮貌
場地設計好，方便觀看
Great place in HK where you can see different kids of performances including drama, music concerto and more.
舒適地觀賞演藝節目。

reviews.text: This is a great place to indulge yourself into arts ans culture. There are a lot of performances without heavy marketing, live on stage and reasonably priced tickets. I came to this place since I was in high school, and still love this place

We attend performances at the Lyric theatre at the Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts (HKAPA) in Wan Chai probably 2-3 times a year on average depending on the HK Arts Festival line up and other performances scheduled throughout the year.

result.adr_address: 香港灣仔告士打道1號
result.name: 香港演藝學院

reviews.text: This is a great place to indulge yourself into arts ans culture. There are a lot of performances without heavy marketing, live on stage and reasonably priced tickets. I came to this place since I was in high school, and still love this place

We attend performances at the Lyric theatre at the Hong Kong Academy of Performing Arts (HKAPA) in Wan Chai probably 2-3 times a year on average depending on the HK Arts Festival line up and other performances scheduled throughout the year. 

It is a decent theatre with good enough acoustics. There are three levels of seating and most seats are comfortable enough for shows. Toilet facilities are on the ground floor not far from the ticketing counter. 

The complex is within short walk of the Wanchai MTR Station and some decent dining in the Wanchai district if you know where to look for it.
香港最高藝術學院,但比其它地區就偏低,因市民欣賞能力不高,而且商埸化

香港演藝學院（英語：The Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts）於1984年按《香港演藝學院條例》成立[1]，是香港唯一專門培養表演藝術人才的公立院校，亦是香港藝術領域的最高學術機構。演藝學院提供學士課程與實踐為本的碩士課程，學習範疇包括中國戲曲、舞蹈、戲劇、電影與電視、音樂與舞台及製作藝術。

演藝學院的教育方針著重反映香港的多元文化，中西兼容，更提倡跨學科學習。演藝學院於1992年起獲頒授獲香港學術評審局批准頒授學士學位，於2006年起頒授碩士學位。亦在中國戲曲、舞蹈、音樂範疇開辦文憑與高級文憑課程。[2]

校本部的教學大樓在1985年9月18日落成，座落香港島灣仔告士打道1號，由關善明建築師事務所設計（而此大樓亦為關善明的成名之作），鄰近香港藝術中心。薄扶林伯大尼古蹟校園於2007年起起立，作為電影電視學院的培訓設施的所在地。除正規課程外，香港演藝學院亦設有演藝進修學院，開設夜間兼讀課程[3]。現任校長是華道賢（Professor Adrian Walter）教授。[4]
